text:
@DeAnna4Congress Or they might've fully milked COVID19 to the max; while blaming China; and (somehow) blaming Republican Senate & US Healthcare... 

And from what we've seen, impact Senior Homes (and MILLIONS of others) just to overwhelm the system; & FOIST their Gov't-run Universal Healthcare.😏
